meanings.definition: A red, painful lump near the edge of the eyelid, caused by a bacterial infection of a sebaceous gland.
meanings.sent1: The hordeolum on her eyelid made it difficult for her to blink.
meanings.sent2: I woke up with a hordeolum on my eye, and it was quite uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The hordeolum decided to show up right before her important presentation.
meanings.sent4: The hordeolum felt like a tiny volcano ready to erupt on her eyelid.
meanings.sent5: The hordeolum throbbed with each heartbeat, a constant reminder of its presence.
